extension_name.description: Shadowmap Location allows you to open the current location from Google Maps/Earth in Shadowmap and vice versa.

extension_description.message: Open the current location from Google Maps/Earth in Shadowmap and vice versa.
extension_description.description: Shadowmap Location is an extension that allows you to open the current location in Shadowmap with one click in Google Maps. The whole thing also works in the other direction. With a click on the extension icon you can display the current location opened in Google Maps/Earth in Shadowmap.
